name: Fontarabia Road, SW11
description: This incredible home spans in excess of 2,300 sq ft and is beautifully arranged over three principle floors and affords a level of finish which is uncommon in the local market.

Entering off Culford Mews there is a large garage with the potential for a car lift. On the ground floor is a large double bedroom which is currently used as an additional reception and benefits from a private patio and beautiful bathroom with contemporary style free-standing volcanic bath, separate walk-in shower and elegant marble tiling.

To the lower ground floor, a wide hallway with ample bespoke inbuilt storage leads to a further double bedroom with skylight window and a further shower room with 'Jack and Jill' contemporary style basins and walk-in shower.  A further versatile space to the front of the property is currently laid out as a private gym.

To the upper (first) floor, there is an impressive open plan reception/kitchen/diner, with private balconies to either end and superb space for relaxing, entertaining and dining.  The kitchen area itself comprises a full range of high quality matching white fronted wall, base and drawer units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit, gas hob with overhead extractor and electric oven, and further range of integrated appliances.
The property offers meticulously designed accommodation throughout, with enormous attention to detail, creating a unique living space in an extremely sought after location.

The property is conveniently located within easy access of both Dalston Junction and Dalston Kingsland stations, as well as numerous regular bus routes providing excellent cross-London links.  Dalston itself offers an array of fashionable shops, bars, cafes and restaurants, all within just a short distance of the property. Ref: ISL
NB: Please note that this property has been digitally staged with funiture.
